text: Saint-Basile-le-Grand station is a commuter rail station operated by Exo in Saint-Basile-le-Grand, Quebec, Canada. It is served by the Mont-Saint-Hilaire line. == Connecting bus routes == === CIT de la Vallée du Richelieu === {| class="wikitable" !style="background: #; font-size:100%; color:#FFFFFF;" colspan="4"|CIT de la Vallée du Richelieu |- ! title: Saint-Basile-le-Grand station
